task.title: How do I change my availability status?

titlealts.searchtitle: Chat: How do I change my availability status?

task.shortdesc: When you change your availability status, you can also customize the message that others see.

step.cmd: Change your status in either of two places.

substep.cmd: On the footer of any page, click and change your availability status. Select I am Available, I am Away, In a Meeting, or Do Not Disturb.
